title: Font used on church epitaph?
content:
Hi everyone,   
   
looking for a font which has a similar feel/look to the one used on this epitaph in the cathedral of Muenster (Germany) (around 1526) . Any pointers?   
   
 ![epitaph](http://web.archive.org/web/20070714143134im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70592.jpg)   
   
Thanks! Seb

 [‹ Hollywood font (1960) - digital alternative](http://web.archive.org/web/20070714143134/http:/typophile.com/node/10518 "Go to previous forum topic") [Striped Geometric Type... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070714143134/http:/typophile.com/node/10531 "Go to next forum topic")
author: allaboutseb

comments.content:
Bert, Thanks for the Link to Scriptorium - some lovely fonts there, but unfortunately I couldn't find a close match.   
   
Any other ideas?

You could look into the work of Manfred Klein, who has done tons of revivals. A place to start:   
   
 [http://jeff.cs.mcgill.ca/~luc/klein.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070714143134/http:/jeff.cs.mcgill.ca/~luc/klein.html)   
   
Here is a lot of info about his work.
